item.description:
Informal networking and cash bar begin at 5:30, dinner at 6:30.

Fattoush Salad

Romaine Lettuce, Cucumber, Tomato, Mint, Onion, Parsley, Radish and Spices with Toasted Pita Bread, Olive Oil and Lemon Juice


Choice of One of the following:

Swai (a mild white fish) Pan-Seared with Lemon Butter Sauce, Artichokes and Tomatoes

Beef Kebab, Charbroiled, marinated Beef & Onions served with Rice Pilaf

Chicken Kebab, Charbroiled and marinated, served with Rice Pilaf

Falafel Plate served with Rice Pilaf, Hummus and Tahini Sauce.


Choice of dessert:

Baklava or Tiramisu

Coffee and Tea

 

Please RSVP by Sunday, April 10.
item.why: Every 2 months, the WBOA holds an evening dinner event. These events are less structured than our breakfast meetings, but allows you network and get know your fellow members.
item.name: April Evening Social Event- Cafe Lebanon
